meta.project: Sistema Departamental de Ciencias del Chocó

product_overview: A comprehensive digital platform designed to support the departmental science system of Chocó. It enables real-time management and monitoring of research projects, scientific products, and collaborative workflows, enhanced by automated evaluation processes and cloud-native big data, AI, and cognitive computing.
core_goals: Maintain updated lines of action to support ongoing research activities.
Provide a robust system for uploading, storing, and disseminating scientific documents and experiences.
Enable real-time monitoring of research processes and work plans.
Implement a secure digital control system for user roles, collaboration, and access management.
Deliver continuous evaluation and scoring of projects through automated and multi-criteria assessment.
Automate methodologies using AI for evaluation, monitoring, and alerts.
Leverage cloud computing and big data infrastructure to ensure scalable and efficient system performance.
key_features: Complete authentication system with role-based access control (ADMIN, INVESTIGATOR, COMMUNITY).
Full CRUD management of research projects including states, dates, budgets, collaborators, and associated products.
Scientific product management with metadata and authorship roles.
Administrative dashboard with system-wide statistics, user management, and settings.
File management using Cloudflare R2 for document upload, download, and organization.
Automated scoring and evaluation based on project completeness, collaboration, productivity, impact, innovation, and timeline.
Smart alert system for risk monitoring and productivity improvements.
Real-time monitoring dashboard with auto-refresh every 2 minutes.
Collaborator management system with role assignments and permissions.
Authorship management for scientific products with multiple contributor roles.
RESTful API covering all system functionalities and secured authentication.
Modern frontend built with React, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS for responsive and intuitive UI.
TypeScript definitions and interfaces ensuring robust type safety across the system.
user_flow_summary: Users register and authenticate through a secure JWT-based system with differentiated roles.
Admins create, update, and manage research projects, assigning collaborators and setting project parameters.
Researchers upload and link scientific products to projects with proper authorship attribution.
Collaborators access the dashboard to monitor project progress, receive alerts, and review evaluation scores.
The system automatically evaluates project status and triggers intelligent alerts based on predefined criteria.
Admins and users use the real-time dashboard to visualize metrics and trends, supporting decision-making.
All actions respect role-based permissions enforced by the backend and frontend.
Files related to projects and products are uploaded, organized, and accessible through a centralized file management interface.
validation_criteria: All core components (lines of action, document management, monitoring, collaboration, evaluation, automation, and cloud infrastructure) are fully implemented and operational as per 100% completion confirmation.
Authentication works reliably with JWT tokens supporting all user roles and secure access.
File uploads support multiple formats and are stored in Cloudflare R2 with metadata management.
Real-time dashboards refresh automatically every 2 minutes, reflecting current project and system statuses.
Evaluation scoring algorithms produce automatic categorizations and AI-generated recommendations.
Alerting system generates proactive notifications and supports intelligent rule triggers.
System architecture leverages Cloudflare Workers, D1, R2, and KV for scalable cloud-native deployment.
Frontend UI is responsive and user-friendly, built with React, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS.
APIs are RESTful, comprehensive, and secured, covering all needed operations for users, projects, products, alerts, and scoring.

features.name: Sistema de Autenticación
features.description: Sistema completo de autenticación con JWT, registro de usuarios, login y control de roles (ADMIN, INVESTIGATOR, COMMUNITY)

features.name: Gestión de Proyectos
features.description: CRUD completo para proyectos de investigación con estados, fechas, presupuesto, colaboradores y productos asociados

features.name: Gestión de Productos Científicos
features.description: Sistema para registrar y gestionar productos científicos (artículos, software, patentes, etc.) con metadatos y autoría

features.name: Panel de Administración
features.description: Dashboard administrativo con estadísticas, gestión de usuarios, proyectos, productos y configuración del sistema

features.name: Sistema de Archivos
features.description: Gestión de archivos con Cloudflare R2, subida, descarga y organización por entidades (proyectos/productos)

features.name: Sistema de Scoring y Evaluación
features.description: Algoritmo automatizado de evaluación de proyectos basado en completitud, colaboración, productividad, impacto e innovación

features.name: Sistema de Alertas Inteligentes
features.description: Motor de alertas automáticas para monitoreo de riesgos, productividad y oportunidades de mejora

features.name: Dashboard de Monitoreo
features.description: Panel de monitoreo en tiempo real con métricas del sistema, estadísticas y tendencias

features.name: Gestión de Colaboradores
features.description: Sistema para asignar colaboradores a proyectos con roles específicos y permisos diferenciados

features.name: Sistema de Autoría
features.description: Gestión de autoría de productos científicos con roles de autor, co-autor, editor y revisor

features.name: API RESTful
features.description: API completa con endpoints para todas las funcionalidades del sistema, autenticación y autorización

features.name: Frontend React

features.name: Tipos y Interfaces
